title: Taiwan Olympic Legend Finds Her Life Story In Aamir Khan's 'Dangal'
content: "When I watched Dangal with Chinese subtitles a few years ago, I noticed an uncanny resemblance between the wrestlers' father and my own," says Chen Shih-hsin, Taiwan's first-ever Olympic gold medallist.
summary: "When I watched Dangal with Chinese subtitles a few years ago, I noticed an uncanny resemblance between the wrestlers' father and my own," says Chen Shih-hsin, Taiwan's first-ever Olympic gold medallist.

title: France Rail Network Hit By "Malicious Acts" Hours Before Olympics Kick-Off
content: "This is a massive attack on a large scale to paralyse the TGV network," SNCF told AFP, adding that many routes will have to be cancelled and the situation would last "at least all weekend while repairs are conducted".
summary: "This is a massive attack on a large scale to paralyse the TGV network," SNCF told AFP, adding that many routes will have to be cancelled and the situation would last "at least all weekend while repairs are conducted".

title: Ismael "Mayo" Zambada: The Mexican Drug Lord Who Evaded Arrests For Decades
content: The United States had offered a $15 million reward for information leading to Zambada's arrest, accusing him of trafficking cocaine, heroin, methamphetamines and fentanyl
summary: The United States had offered a $15 million reward for information leading to Zambada's arrest, accusing him of trafficking cocaine, heroin, methamphetamines and fentanyl

title: Climate Change Intensifies Rainfall Patterns, Typhoons, Warn Scientists
content: "This is going to increase as global warming continues, enhancing the chances of droughts and/or floods."
summary: "This is going to increase as global warming continues, enhancing the chances of droughts and/or floods."

title: "I Pray Your Daughter Is...": Jennifer Aniston Slams Trump's Running Mate
content: An old comment by Donald Trump's running mate JD Vance - suggesting childless women are less fit to govern - has sparked a volley of criticism, the latest snap coming from actor Jennifer Aniston.
summary: An old comment by Donald Trump's running mate JD Vance - suggesting childless women are less fit to govern - has sparked a volley of criticism, the latest snap coming from actor Jennifer Aniston.

title: After 55 Years, One Of Australia's Biggest Maritime Mysteries Solved
content: 55 years after it sank, killing 21 men, Australian scientists have finally located the shipwreck of the MV Noongah.
summary: 55 years after it sank, killing 21 men, Australian scientists have finally located the shipwreck of the MV Noongah.

title: JD Vance's "Childless Cat Ladies" Jab At Kamala Harris Sparks Uproar
content: US Republican vice presidential nominee JD Vance is learning the hard way the internet doesn't just love cats but also childless cat ladies, as comments resurfaced in which he claimed those without offspring were less fit to govern.
summary: US Republican vice presidential nominee JD Vance is learning the hard way the internet doesn't just love cats but also childless cat ladies, as comments resurfaced in which he claimed those without offspring were less fit to govern.

title: Sri Lanka's First Presidential Vote Since Unrest To Be Held On September 21
content: The election will be the first test of the public mood since the height of the 2022 downturn, which caused months of food, fuel and medicine shortages across the island nation.
summary: The election will be the first test of the public mood since the height of the 2022 downturn, which caused months of food, fuel and medicine shortages across the island nation.

title: Does Joe Biden Have Parkinson's Disease? What His Personal Doctor Says
content: Joe Biden bowed out of the White House on Sunday after weeks of pressure that began with a disastrous June 27 debate performance against Republican candidate Donald Trump that raised concerns about his age and mental acuity.
summary: Joe Biden bowed out of the White House on Sunday after weeks of pressure that began with a disastrous June 27 debate performance against Republican candidate Donald Trump that raised concerns about his age and mental acuity.

title: US Senator Introduces Bill That Proposes To Treat India Like Its Top Allies
content: The bill proposes to treat India as if it were of the same status as the US allies such as Japan, Israel, Korea, and NATO allies.
summary: The bill proposes to treat India as if it were of the same status as the US allies such as Japan, Israel, Korea, and NATO allies.

title: Mexican Drug Lord 'El Mayo' And El Chapo's Son Arrested In US
content: Mexican drug lord Ismael "El Mayo" Zambada and the son of his former partner, Joaquin "El Chapo" Guzman, were arrested in Texas, U.S. Attorney General Merrick Garland said in a statement on Thursday.
summary: Mexican drug lord Ismael "El Mayo" Zambada and the son of his former partner, Joaquin "El Chapo" Guzman, were arrested in Texas, U.S. Attorney General Merrick Garland said in a statement on Thursday.

title: OpenAI Announces SearchGPT To Challenge Google
content: OpenAI on Thursday said it was putting its artificial intelligence engine to work in a challenge to Google's market-dominating search engine.
summary: OpenAI on Thursday said it was putting its artificial intelligence engine to work in a challenge to Google's market-dominating search engine.

title: Biden Committed To Attending QUAD Summit In India: White House
content: US President Joe Biden is still committed to attending the annual leadership summit of the QUAD countries which is scheduled to be held in India this year, the White House said on Thursday.
summary: US President Joe Biden is still committed to attending the annual leadership summit of the QUAD countries which is scheduled to be held in India this year, the White House said on Thursday.

title: "Will Not Be Silent" On Gaza, Says Kamala Harris After Netanyahu Meeting
content: US Vice President Kamala Harris signaled a major shift in Gaza policy on Thursday, telling Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu she had "serious concern" over casualties and telling him to get a peace deal done.
summary: US Vice President Kamala Harris signaled a major shift in Gaza policy on Thursday, telling Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu she had "serious concern" over casualties and telling him to get a peace deal done.

title: "Disgusting": White House Describes Sexist Attacks On Kamala Harris
content: The White House on Thursday described as "disgusting" the increasing sexist and racist attacks on Vice President Kamala Harris which has intensified after she became the presumptive presidential nominee of the Democratic party.
summary: The White House on Thursday described as "disgusting" the increasing sexist and racist attacks on Vice President Kamala Harris which has intensified after she became the presumptive presidential nominee of the Democratic party.

title: Trump Leads Kamala Harris 48%-46% Among Registered Voters: Survey
content: Republican Donald Trump leads Democratic U.S. Vice President Kamala Harris by 48% to 46% in a New York Times/Siena College poll of registered voters conducted July 22 to 24 and published on Thursday.
summary: Republican Donald Trump leads Democratic U.S. Vice President Kamala Harris by 48% to 46% in a New York Times/Siena College poll of registered voters conducted July 22 to 24 and published on Thursday.

title: Humanity Suffering From "Extreme Heat Epidemic": UN Chief
content: Humanity is suffering from an "extreme heat epidemic," UN Secretary-General Antonio Guterres warned Thursday, calling for action to limit the impacts of heat waves intensified by climate change.
summary: Humanity is suffering from an "extreme heat epidemic," UN Secretary-General Antonio Guterres warned Thursday, calling for action to limit the impacts of heat waves intensified by climate change.

title: Israeli PM Netanyahu Says Will Work With Joe Biden "In The Months Ahead"
content: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said Thursday he would work with Joe Biden for his remaining time in office, after the US president's stunning decision to drop his reelection bid.
summary: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said Thursday he would work with Joe Biden for his remaining time in office, after the US president's stunning decision to drop his reelection bid.

title: Israel Warns France Of Iranian Threats Against Israelis At Olympics Games
content: Israel warned France on Thursday of potential threats from Iran-backed groups against Israeli athletes and tourists in Paris during the Olympic Games.
summary: Israel warned France on Thursday of potential threats from Iran-backed groups against Israeli athletes and tourists in Paris during the Olympic Games.

title: North Korean Hackers Trying To Steal Military Secrets, Say US, Allies
content: North Korean hackers have conducted a global cyber espionage campaign to try to steal classified military secrets to support Pyongyang's banned nuclear weapons programme, the United States, Britain and South Korea said in a joint advisory on Thursday
summary: North Korean hackers have conducted a global cyber espionage campaign to try to steal classified military secrets to support Pyongyang's banned nuclear weapons programme, the United States, Britain and South Korea said in a joint advisory on Thursday
